amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to direct the secretary to expedite reports for the navigation project for San Juan Harbor, Puerto Rico, per the study authorized by resolution of the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure on September 20, 2006.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gonzalez-Colon (PR) amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Miss Gonzalez-Colon (PR).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gonzalez-Colon (PR) amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
